Sentencas: This paper presents an exergetic analysis of a combined heat and power (CHP) system, integrating a near-atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with an allothermal biomass fluidised bed steam gasification process.
Titulo: Exergetic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification integration with heat pipes

Sentencas: The gasification heat requirement is supplied to the fluidised bed from the SOFC stack through high-temperature sodium heat pipes.
Titulo: Exergetic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification integration with heat pipes

Sentencas: The CHP system was modelled in AspenPlus (TM) software including sub-models for the gasification, SOFC, gas cleaning and heat pipes.
Titulo: Exergetic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification integration with heat pipes

Sentencas: For an average current density of 3000 A m(-2) the proposed system would consume 90 kg h(-1) biomass producing 170kW(e) net power with a system exergetic efficiency of 36%, out of which 34% are electrical.
Titulo: Exergetic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell and biomass gasification integration with heat pipes
